column1: BBWM deposition and stream data for Irena Creed, David Aldred

column2: annual deposition for East Bear (reference watershed). To calculate annual deposition for West Bear, add 25.2 kg NH4-N/ha/yr and 28.8 kg SO4-S/ha/yr to the ambient (EB) values.
BBWM = collected at the site; HOW132 = using data for CASTNET Howland site (HOW132). Note: HOW132 provides only total N and total S data, not NH4N, NO3N.
monthly export for EB and WB streams. To calculate annual export, add all the months for each year.
EB = East Bear (reference), WB = West Bear (treated)
EB = East Bear (reference), WB = West Bear (treated)
REG = regular grab sample, ISCO = ISCO autosampler
USGS 01022294 East Br Bear Brook near Beddington, Maine
